short_summary: Task and solutions professional services ", 2.6 Change Management Consultant - Level 3 (Senior)
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking to issue one (1) contract for one (1) Senior Change Management Consultant (Stream 2.6) under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) method of supply.
full_summary:
## Task and Solutions Professional Services - Change Management Consultant (Level 3, Senior)
### RFQ# : 1000251204

**Notices:**

* This solicitation is an amendment to the original tender notice, dated 2023-07-26.
* All interested parties are required to submit their proposals electronically to the specified contact below before the close of business on Thursday, August 10, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EDT.

**Overview:**
The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a Senior Change Management Consultant (Stream 2.6) through the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) contract.

**Required Components:**
The scope of this contract includes the provision of a Senior Change Management Consultant to work on a project described in Annex A - Statement of Work. The contract is for a period of nine (9) months from October 1, 2023 to June 30, 2024, with the option to extend the contract for an additional twelve (12) months.

**Key Dates:**
- Tender Closing Date: August 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
- Anticipated Contract Commencement Date: October 1, 2023
- Anticipated Contract Expiration Date: March 31, 2024
- Final Contract Expiration Date: June 30, 2024 (subject to the extension as mentioned above)

**Eligibility and Criteria:**
* The requested services are limited to parties who are eligible to provide services under the TSPS-SA contract.
* Evaluation criteria include a Combination Score for Technical Merit and Price.

**Submission Requirements:**
- All proposals submitted must include a Technical Proposal, a Price Proposal, and all necessary attachments.
- The evaluation team will assess the technical merit and price of each proposal.

**Contract Information:**
- This contract is subject to applicable trade agreements.
- Entities interested in providing a local service are invited to submit proposals.

### Contact Information:
 Montana Myers
Public Health Agency of Canada
200 Eglantine Drive
Ottawa, Ontario K1Z 0K9
Phone: Not Provided
Email: [montana.myers@santehc.gc.ca](mailto:montana.myers@hc-sc.gc.ca



### Attachments:

Please find the attached tenders in both English and French: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca
